com.robodoot.dr.RoboApp

Class FdActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.robodoot.dr.RoboApp.FdActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewListener2

    public class FdActivity
extends Activity
implements org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewListener2
    Behavior mode activity. This is the main activity of the app. It uses OpenCV/JavaCV for face detection and color tracking. Image processing occurs in the onCameraFrame(org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewFrame) method.

      • onActivityResult

        protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                    int resultCode,
                    Intent data)
        This is called after speech recognition. The recognized words come in as a list of strings and are processed to make the cat perform actions or change emotion state.

      • onCameraViewStarted

        public void onCameraViewStarted(int width,
                       int height)
        initialize stuff related to opencv
        Specified by:
        onCameraViewStarted in interface org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewListener2
        Parameters:
        width - - the width of the frames that will be delivered
        height - - the height of the frames that will be delivered

      • onCameraViewStopped

        public void onCameraViewStopped()
        Description copied from interface: org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewListener2
        This method is invoked when camera preview has been stopped for some reason. No frames will be delivered via onCameraFrame() callback after this method is called.
        Specified by:
        onCameraViewStopped in interface org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewListener2

      • onCameraFrame

        public org.opencv.core.Mat onCameraFrame(org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewFrame inputFrame)
        Process a video frame (do face detection, color tracking)
        Specified by:
        onCameraFrame in interface org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewListener2
        Parameters:
        inputFrame - the image to process
        Returns:
        a possibly modified inputFrame to be displayed

      • trackColor

        private org.opencv.core.Point trackColor(org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase.CvCameraViewFrame inputFrame,
                               com.robodoot.roboapp.ColorValues cv)
        Track an object by color.
        Parameters:
        inputFrame - The image to process.
        cv - The min/max HSV values to see.
        Returns:
        a Point position of object or null if no object found normalized to range [-0.5, 0.5]
